short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension for controlling the scrubbing rate on YouTube. Hold the Ctrl key while pressing the right or left arrow keys

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Traditionally, when watching a YouTube video, the user can press either of the arrow keys to skip 5 seconds of the video in either direction. This Chrome extension can be used to control the scrubbing rate on YouTube when pressing the arrow keys. With this extension, the user is no longer limited to scrubbing through a video 5 seconds at a time but rather they can chose from a variety of speeds. To use this extension, hold the Ctrl key on your keyboard when pressing either of the arrow keys.
